derivation: middle voice of a derivative of G3306 (μνάομαι) or perhaps of the base of G3145 (μνάομαι) (through the idea of fixture in the mind or of mental grasp);
kjv_def: be mindful, remember, come (have) in remembrance
strongs_def: to bear in mind, i.e. recollect; by implication, to reward or punish
outline:
1. to remind
    1. to be recalled or to return to one's mind, to remind one's self of, to remember
    2. to be recalled to mind, to be remembered, had in remembrance
    3. to remember a thing
    4. be mindful of
